title: Mouse Buttons 4 and 5 not working since Creators Update for Windows
body: After the Windows Creator update, my side buttons on my mouse have stopped working in game. When I try to rebind them, I cannot. Very frustrating since when I play, I almost completely utilize mouse buttons 4 and 5 for actives and without them it has become extremely difficult. :/

replies.body:
For anyone who's still having this issue I've found a solution for me.

Press the Windows button and click the gear icon, go to gaming and turn off Windows gaming mode. 

My MB4 and 5 work fine after doing so

I've seen a few reports on this, and I believe you should be able to bind it while in-game.  You might have an issue trying to setup the binding through the client, but try a custom game and binding it there.  Let me know if that helps.

**Update**:  There is an issue with Windows Creator update that's preventing extra mouse buttons from binding.  We don't currently have additional info to offer, but rolling back to the previous OS version can server as a workaround.

HOW TO FIX IT:
Open Device manager and disable the HID compliant mouse and all other mice except yours. After that Button 4 and 5 start working in-game, but still didnt work in launcher settings.

Confirmed. Blackwidow keyboard was showing up as a mouse, and needed to be disabled in device manager.

I solved mine by doing the following

1. Download the mouse test tool above

2. Remove all mouse except the one you have trouble with

3. Open device manager, in the mouse section if you see two mice, disable one

4. If your mouse stopped working, re-enable it using keyboard or replugging

5. Disable the one which won't freeze your mouse

6. Restart the test tool, it should now properly detect it as a 5-button mouse

Confirmed fix:
Go to your Device Manager
Disable any other mouse devices currently enabled (besides HID compliant mouse)
Fixed

My computer updated to the creators update on windows 10 and now my mouse buttons 4 and 5 are not working. Been trying different things in the practice tool gamemode  but couldn't find any keyboard shortcuts that I could get used to. Will try some of the work arounds (device manager) and will update but just wanted to see if anything else was known or being done. Razer deathadder mouse and blackwidow keyboard.

The issue is the creators edition of windows spawns more than one instance of your mouse driver for every mouse you have attached to your PC. For me I have one mouse attached yet in the device list it shows 3. So simply "Disabling" (not removing) the extra mouse instances fixes the issue. 

This does involve some trial and error. But don't worry if you have disabled the "real" driver for your mouse, all you need to do is plug it into a different USB port and its all good to go again (with a new set of up to 3x instances of the same mouse) 

Here is a screenshot of my device list with 2x mouse driver instances disabled:
